0: Under the leadership of the crooked, yet experienced Grankin, most people of Otradnoye finally felt some hope for a brighter future
9.170946: This hope never did become reality
11.79122: After the death of Dan, his gang, that formerly protected Otradnoye, scattered all over the Wastes, and the village was quickly raised by marauding raiders
22.70901: The survivors told people that Grankin fled the village right before the attack
28.38626: Gone with him, was the village budget
